quests.name: Ring of the Flying Squid
quests.description: Allows you to fly up for a short time. Requires GP.

quests.name: Quantum Quarry
quests.description: Your mining automation.

tasks.longDescription:
To setup you will need to place Quantum Quarry in the center and Quantum Quarry Actuators from each side.

For Quarry to function you will have to provide it with power (20000 RF per block). Note that Quarry does not mine from the world so you can mine indefinitely.

Enchanted book acts as enchant on a tool. Biome Marker can set the biome it mines from.

quests.name: Energy Storage
quests.description: All the energy storage you will ever need.

quests.name: Mob Grinder
quests.description: Kills mobs in a 7x7 area in front of it with inserted item.

quests.name: Stellar Alloy
quests.description:
Most powerfull alloy.

Tip: Use in SAG Mill as a grinding ball for best output.

quests.name: Wyvern Armor
quests.description: Really strong armor.

tasks.longDescription:
Allows you to go fast, jump high and has strong shield.

Can be modified by the Draconic Evolution `Tool & Armor Congig GUI` (search in Controls).

Can be upgraded with various upgrades with Fusion Crafting.

quests.name: Nether Star
quests.description: Spawn and kill the Wither Boss.

tasks.longDescription:
To spawn a Wither Boss place 4 Soul Sands in a T tetris shape and then on the top 3 Soul Sands place 3 Wither Skulls.

The Formation will start. Keep in mind that while Wither Boss is still forming it will not take damage and that the formation will end with an explosion.
It's time to overcome your horrors!

quests.name: Iridium Reinforced Plate
quests.description: Most durable plating.

tasks.longDescription: You can find Iridium Shards scattered around the world in dungeons.

quests.name: Draconic Core
quests.description: Basic Core in Draconic Tech.

quests.name: Draconic Reactor
quests.description: All the power you will ever need.

quests.name: Electric Jetpack
quests.description: Allows you to fly up while it has energy.

quests.name: Draconic Armor
quests.description: The best armor!

tasks.longDescription:
Allows you to flight, allows you to go super fast, jump super high, keeps you saturated, has incredibly strong shield.

Can be modified by the Draconic Evolution `Tool & Armor Congig GUI` (search in Controls).

Can be upgraded with various upgrades with Fusion Crafting.

quests.name: Jetpack
quests.description: Allows you to go up while it has fuel.

quests.name: Molecular Transformer
quests.description: Transforms things into other things.

quests.name: Wings Of The Bats
quests.description: Gives you Creative Flight for 40 seconds, with cooldown.

quests.name: Draconium
quests.description: Base material for Draconic Tech.

quests.name: The End
quests.description: You feel like something awaits you on the other side! You should prepare for anything.

tasks.longDescription: Use Eyes of Ender to find a stronghold and to lit a portal.

quests.name: Stabilized Mob Spawner
quests.description: End Game Spawner. It doesn't use energy. It has to be provided with Mob Soul, which you have chance obtaining when slaying the mob with Reaper enchantment. The Core can be interchanged for another one by right clicking with it.

quests.name: Transdimensional ME Access
quests.description: ME Crafting terminal that can access your ME Network anywhere! (when provided with Infinity Booster Cards)

quests.name: Chicken Wing Ring
quests.description: Allows you to fall slowly for a short time. Requires GP.

quests.name: Awakened Draconium
quests.description: Draconium infused with heart of the Dragon.

quests.name: UU-Matter
quests.description: Universal Usable Matter - turns into all kinds of stuff.

tasks.longDescription:
Matter Fabricator:
Converts energy into liquid UU-Matter. Scrap speeds the process up 6 times. Be aware that this block tends to by rather explosive when shorted.

Replicator
Uses a scanned recipe to create the item from UU-Matter.

Scanner:
Scans items whenewer it is posible and how to replicate them.

Pattern Storage:
Stores paterns for replicating. When being adjacent to Replicator, it provides it's knowledge.

quests.name: Draconium Chest
quests.description: Shulker like chest with 260 inventory slots, 5 furnace slots and a crafting table.

quests.name: The Drill
quests.description:
Drill that can satisfy all your needs.


Upgrades can be put inside by crouch-right clicking. (Uses Actually Additions upgrades)

quests.name: QuantumSuit
quests.description: Quantum technology inside.

quests.name: Scrap
quests.description:
Using Scrap in UU-matter creation process makes it 6 times more efficient.

Scrap Box is a compressed version of Scrap.

quests.name: NanoSuit
quests.description: Nano technology inside.

quests.name: Chaos Shards
quests.description: You will find Chaos Shards in the center of Chaos Island which is guarded by the Chaos Guardian.

quests.name: Angel Ring
quests.description: Gives you Creative Flight. Requires GP.

quests.name: Wyvern Core
quests.description: Second Draconic Core.

tasks.longDescription: For this and next tiers you will have to use Fusion Crafting from Draconic Evolution.

quests.name: Dislocation
quests.description: Teleportation technology.

quests.name: Hybrid
quests.description: Hybrid technology combiding high capacity of Iron Chests with portability of Sulker Boxes resulting in this special kind of storage.

quests.name: Sulker
quests.description: There are tales of creatures with power of holding, but they live far far away and are guarded by an ancient entity.

quests.name: Ender Dragon
quests.description: You heard tales of an ancient entity which guards the entrance to The End. Your instinct tells you to defeat it!

tasks.longDescription:
Kill an Ender Dragon!

You can resummon the dragon by placing End Crystals on the edges of End Portal in 4 cardinal directions.

quests.name: Dragon Heart
quests.description: Key ingredient for awakening the Draconium material.

tasks.longDescription: You can get one by slaying the Ender Dragon, or by slaying the Chaos Guardian.
